Desc.eng: Do you know the cure to the Rustblight?
Don’t tell me that you found someone suffering from this arcane disease! You can only get infected in the Ink, you know. Yes, I might be able to concoct a remedy, but…

There is a chance that the cure will only turn him into a walking corpse that spreads the infection! I’d sadly suggest that you should kill him. But then bring me his heart! It could be useful for research. I’ll be very grateful.
I’ll take the chances. Give me the cure.
That’s terrible. But then I’ll do what must be done and deal with him.
